alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 5:41AM EST until December 24 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Belknap and Grafton Counties. For the Pemigewasset River...including Woodstock, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Plymouth. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. At 14.0 feet, Water enters the parking lot behind the PSU ice arena. At 15.0 feet, Flood waters up to the road at the Irving station on route 175A in Holderness. At 15.5 feet, Flood waters over the road at the Irving station on route 175A in Holderness. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:50 AM EST Saturday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
